hard_constraints.description: Now class, pay attention: a drone cannot simply teleport across the map. We must ensure that if it moves from one location to another between consecutive time steps, those two points must have a valid connection defined in our edges.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- at(L1, T), at(L2, T+1), not edge(L1, L2), not edge(L2, L1), time(T).

hard_constraints.description: Students, it is vital that we fulfill our mission objectives! This rule ensures that the drone must be present at locations 3 and 4 at some point during the flight, regardless of the order.
Every journey has a specific starting point, class. We need to explicitly state that at the very beginning of our timeline—time step zero—the drone is located at the headquarters, which is point 1.
